definitions: the action of putting something right

examples.text: rectification of common errors in letter writing
demands for rectification of terrible injustices
rectifications are sent to the client for feedback

definitions: the conversion of an alternating current to a direct current

examples.text: the inward rectification of single-channel currents

shortDefinitions: conversion of alternating current to direct current

definitions: the purification or refinement of a substance by repeated or continuous distillation

examples.text: the light oil obtained by these processes also needs to be treated through the process of rectification
